data.title: What Has Jesse James Been Up To Since Cheating On Sandra Bullock?

data.text:
It's been a very long time since Sandra Bullock and her ex-husband, mechanic and entrepreneur Jesse James, made the headlines. The couple married in 2005 and divorced 5 years later, and being both important public figures, they were not allowed too much privacy. Sandra used to be the one that most certainly suffered from having her marital problems broadcasted probably the most, since it was Jesse's infidelity that the media exploited essentially the most, however fortunately the buzz has died down, and Jesse has since apologized extensively.

RELATED: Things We Forgot About The Beloved Sandra Bullock

Now, over a decade later, Jesse has moved on in his personal life and career. For those individuals who had been questioning what has been of him since his divorce, these are one of the most things he has been up to.

10 He Had His Own Discovery Channel Show

In 2012, two years after formally finishing his dating with Sandra Bullock, Jesse James used to be offered the potential of doing a show on the Discovery Channel about something he's really : development customized motorcycles. The show was called Outlaw Garage, and even though it handiest lasted one season, he had a great time doing it.

"I'm so happy to be finally doing the show I want to do & doing it with one of my best friends in life Hildie Katibah," Jesse said about it. "She has been a pilar in my life for the last 12 years producing Monster Garage and running Pay Up Sucker Productions. Her & I have made some amazing TV together but we know it's mostly her."

9 He Had A Relationship With Kat Von D

Right after splitting with Sandra, Jesse discovered love again. He began an overly passionate and complex relationship with famous tattoo artist, the fantastic Kat Von D. They stayed together for a little over a year, and even got engaged. They announced their engagement for the primary time in 2011, but in a while when they called it off. For a while it appeared that they made up our minds to give their engagement another probability, but then sadly it didn't figure out. They cut up amicably in the end of 2011.

8 He Was In 'Sons Of Guns'

It's no secret that Jesse is a gun enthusiast, so when he had the chance to make an appearance in Discovery Channel's display, Sons of Guns. The show is ready in Lousiana, and it focuses on a trade that sells custom firearms.

RELATED: Sandra Bullock Has A Huge $250 Million Net Worth: Hereâs How She Made Her Money

Their merchandise are purchased both by means of legislation enforcement officials and private collectors. This isn't the primary time Jesse was invited to the display. He additionally appeared in an episode in 2009.

7 He Started A Handmade Firearms Business

Years ago, Jesse decided to take his passion for guns to the next level. That's how he began his business, Jesse James Firearms Unlimited, making custom firearms. He had some lend a hand learning the talents he needed, and virtually 8 years later, he could not be happier concerning the success he's been having.

"It's an understatement to say how incredibly lucky I have been to learn my skills from some of the best in many disciplines. In 2013 I decided I wanted to build my own 1911 pistols. I looked high and low for the right person to teach me the right way to do things," Jesse explained. "I found Jim Garthwaite in Watsontown Pennsylvania. Boy did I make the right choice. Jim was the American Pistolsmith's Guild, Pistolsmith of the year in 2004. But even more importantly Jim showed me a very pragmatic/non secret sauce way of machining and building 1911's. That makes them very accurate and dependable. Techniques I will use forever."

6 He Had A Granddaughter

One of the most important milestones in Jesse's life since his divorce used to be the beginning of his granddaughter. In March closing yr he announced to his fans that his daughter Chandler was once about to have a toddler.

"Soooooo do you remember that little blonde girl from Motorcycle Mania???? You know the one that thought she was a way better skipper than me?? Well my little girl Chandler is 25 Now! Annnnd expecting a baby due next month. ANNND it's a Girl!!!! And Iâm gonna be a grandpa," Jesse shared on Instagram. "For real though Iâm so proud of CJ. She is such a strong, kind, beautiful woman now. She's going to be an amazing mom. I can see it... Ok now you can go ahead and fill the comments with old man jokes..."

5 He Lost A Dear Friend

It's never simple to lose a liked one, but it is even harder to watch them go down a street figuring out it may not end neatly and being not able to forestall them. Candace Muzny used to be an implausible NASCAR driving force, and he or she also struggled with drug habit. Jesse used to be very shut together with her and her death used to be a low blow, particularly because he shared that he had completed his highest to assist her conquer her problems. Addiction is an excessively critical disease, and recognizing that, Jesse finishes his put up by which he says good-bye to Candace to encourage other folks to achieve out for assist.

4 He Received Some Difficult News

The relationship a person has with the dad or mum of their youngsters never in reality is going away. When Jesse break up up together with his first spouse, the two of them not most effective remained civil but they stayed close buddies. Which made the horrible news Jesse shared together with his lovers even tougher for him. Last year, Karla was identified with early onset Alzheimers and dementia, and in his grief, Jesse reached out to his fans. He defined that he would be caring for her, together with his kids, as a result of she did not have some other circle of relatives, and requested people to send him any recommendation or resource they might percentage so he could be informed to maintain the location.

3 He Shared A Family Tradition

Something readers may now not know is that Jesse takes his almond tart very critically. It was a large second for him when he taught his sixteen year-old daughter his "world-famous" recipe.

RELATED: Miss Congeniality: 10 Of Sandra Bullock's Highest-Paying Roles

He was once very happy with her as a result of she did an excellent task. Another vital piece of data is that, if someone desires to recreate Jesse's secret recipe, he shared it with the sector years in the past on the Martha Stewart show. According to him, it may possibly still be present in her site.

2 He Owns A Culinary Knives Business

Jesse began Jesse James Culinary in 2018. The business sells customized made culinary knives, and the road is as intensive as it is stunning. While clearly the knives have an overly clear use, the patterns and the production process lead them to pieces of art.

"Every knife here at Jesse James Culinary is made by hand," reads their website, the place readers can take a look at the goods. "We cut no corners and spare no detail."

1 He Hosted Another Season Of 'Monster Garage'

Many years ago, in 2002, Jesse become the host of a display referred to as Monster Garage, which confirmed a bunch of mechanics having to adjust cars underneath a time limit. Monster Garage lasted till 2006, and it wasn't till final year that it started up once more. With all of the great reminiscences Jesse has from that show, he was very excited to host it once more. He even had the set blessed by way of a priest, as a result of he wanted the entirety to move completely.
